#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

inline long long int scanInt()
{
	long long int noRead=0;
	char p=getchar_unlocked();
	for(;p<33;)
	{
		p=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	while(p>32)
	{
		noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
		p=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	return noRead;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    t = scanInt();
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,a[10005]={0},b[10005]={0},min;
		
        long long sum = 0;
        
		n = scanInt();
        
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++)
			a[i]=scanInt();
        
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++)
        {
            sum+=a[i];			
            b[i]=sum/(i+1);
        }
		
        min=b[0];
		
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i ++)
			if(min > b[i])
				min=b[i];
				
        printf("%d\n",min);
    }
    return 0;
}
